article: My husband , Micheal , and I were at a restaurant with his boss , a rather stern elderly man . When Micheal began a story I was sure he had told before , I gave him a kick under the table . There was no response , so I gave him another kick . Still the story went on . Suddenly he stopped and said with a smile , " Oh , but I ' ve told you this one before , have n ' t I ? " We all chuckled and changed the subject . Later , on the dance floor , I asked my husband why it had taken him so long to get my message . " What do you mean ? " he replied . " I cut off the story as soon as you kicked me . " " But I kicked you twice , and it still took you a while to stop ! " Suddenly we realized what had happened and returned to our table . The boss smiled and said , " Do n ' t worry . After the second one I thought it was n ' t for me , so I passed it along ! "
questions: It took Micheal so long to stop his story because

model: he got a kick only after a long while
he could n ' t stand his boss ' s words
he did n ' t think it was for him
human: he did n ' t understand at once why he was kicked
the two kicks given were not heavy enough
he got a kick only after a long while
